channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: Introduction My name is Rich Carpenter. I am an economist / data analyst with more than 9 years of experience, primarily with economic and financial data. I have a B.A. in Economics and Political Science and an M.S. in Applied Economics. For more information about my background and experience, please visit my LinkedIn Profile. Source and Theme Information This website was created using the blogdown package. The theme was forked from [@jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme](https://github.
